message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, and I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price considering the product's high quality and unique features.

Thank you for offering me your premium product, Alice. I appreciate the effort and the unique features you mentioned. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that our product can bring significant value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17000. This is a fair price considering the product's quality and features.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16500.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $16500, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer you the product for $16800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16600.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $16600, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer you the product for $16400. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16300.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. I'm not willing to go as low as $16300, but I'll make one more compromise. I'll offer you the product for $16200. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your persistence in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make my final counteroffer of $16100 for the product.
